title: Ticket #2676: Using PublicClaimId causes schedd to crash
description:
In testing my code for #2673, I tried the following submit file: 

executable = /bin/echo
universe = vanilla
arguments = $$([ifThenElse(isUndefined(PublicClaimId),,PublicClaimId)]) $$([ifThenElse(isUndefined(KeepClaimIdle),\"KeepClaimIdle undefined\",KeepClaimIdle)])
output = $(cluster).out
error = $(cluster).err
log = $(cluster).log
queue

This submit file causes the schedd to crash.

The crash dump follows:

remarks:
2011-Dec-01 13:46:33 by nwp:
schedd only crashes in a personal condor, as far as I can see. Otherwise, my job just gets put on hold.

2012-Feb-07 16:40:13 by nwp:
I cannot reproduce this with current master.
creator: nwp
